alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:14PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Lawrence County through 600 PM EDT... At 514 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Norfolk, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canton, Potsdam, Norfolk, Rensselaer Falls, Heuvelton, Morley, Norwood, Madrid, Chipman, Waddington, Pyrites, North Russell, and West Potsdam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
